title: Interpretation of a dream about sheep according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing sheep in a dream Sheep in a dream is a dream that has many interpretations that most often indicate kindness, and they are signs that promise happiness and abundant feeding for the dreamer. All indicators are related to this topic. Seeing sheep in a dream Seeing sheep in a dream is a sign of goodness and abundance of sustenance for the dreamer in the coming season. God willing. Seeing sheep in a dream is also a sign of happy events that will make a person happy during the coming period. A person’s dream of a flock of sheep in a dream is a sign of overcoming crises and problems that he faced in the past. Seeing many sheep in a dream is a sign that he will get married. Close to a girl with morals and religion. Seeing sheep in a dream is a sign of success and success in many matters soon. A person’s dream of sheep is a sign of paying off debts, alleviating distress, and obtaining a lot of money in the coming period. Seeing sheep in a dream by Ibn Sirin, the world’s interpretation The great Ibn Sirin Seeing sheep in a dream is a sign of happiness and blessings that a person will receive. Also, seeing sheep in a dream is a sign of kindness and abundant money that will come to the dreamer in the shortest possible time. Seeing a flock of sheep in a dream is a sign of achieving goals. And the aspirations that a person seeks to achieve for a long time. Seeing sheep heads in a dream means success in many matters and obtaining a prominent position in the coming period. Seeing many sheep in a dream also means that you will receive an inheritance soon. Seeing sheep in a dream for an unmarried woman. Seeing A single girl in a dream about sheep is a sign of abundant kindness and a lot of livelihood that will come her way soon. Also, a girl who sees a sheep in a dream is an indication that she will achieve many of her goals and ambitions that she planned for a long time. Seeing a girl in a dream is about A flock of sheep is a sign that you will overcome the sadness and anxiety of your suffering for some time. Seeing many sheep in a dream is a sign of success and success in many future matters. Also, seeing a sheep in a girl’s dream is evidence of her obtaining high grades in her studies. Interpretation of seeing a flock Of sheep in a dream for a single woman. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream about a flock of sheep symbolizes the abundant goodness and happiness that she will enjoy at this time in her life. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream about a flock of sheep indicates excellence in the field of study or scientific life. Many sheep in a girl’s dream indicate that she will soon marry a wealthy man. A girl’s dream of a flock of sheep also indicates stability in her life’s affairs and the achievement of the goals she has been striving for for a long time. Seeing sheep in a dream for a married woman. Sheep in a married woman’s dream is evidence of stability. Her married life and her freedom from trouble, thank God. Seeing many sheep in a dream for a married woman is evidence that she will soon give birth to a child she has always wanted. The woman’s dream is

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing neighbors in a dream

preview.html: In the following article, we explain to you what is the interpretation of a dream about seeing neighbors in a dream for a single girl, a married woman, and a pregnant woman, based on what was narrated by the jurist and dream interpreter Muhammad ibn Sirin. In his book. The sleeper in his dream is talking to his neighbor, or sees that he is going to his neighbor’s house, and when he wakes up he continues to think a lot about this vision and wants to know its meaning, and for this reason we will explain to you through the following paragraphs of the encyclopedia the interpretation of the dream in detail, so follow us. Interpretation of the dream of seeing neighbors in a dream. Interpretation of a vision Neighbors in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says: If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is marrying his neighbor’s son, this is a good vision and carries many praiseworthy repercussions. Seeing the neighbor’s son in a good image is one of the praiseworthy dreams. If the sleeper sees his neighbor and he has a high degree of Beauty, this indicates the dreamer’s luck in life, and this vision also indicates the arrival of happy events. The jurist Ibn Sirin says that if a married woman sees her neighbor in her dream, this is an indication that she feels reassured and secure in her life. Interpretation of a dream about neighbors who see an unmarried womanIf she sees An unmarried girl dreams that her neighbor was sitting with her and that the neighbor is very religious and has virtuous morals, then this is a vision that heralds to the dreamer the coming of her abundant and blessed strength in her life. If the unmarried girl’s neighbor causes a lot of trouble and the unmarried girl sees her in her dream, this is a hateful vision and indicates... Some difficulties will occur in the dreamer’s life, and he must seek God’s help to get rid of them. All those problems and difficulties that disturb her peace. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is going to her neighbor’s house, this is a vision that indicates safety, protection, and calm in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of dreams for a neighbor’s son Seeing an unmarried woman If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that her neighbor is asking for her hand To get married and wants to marry her, then this dream indicates that the dreamer will obtain ample sustenance in the coming period. This vision may indicate that the dreamer will be able to achieve all the goals and ambitions that she seeks. Interpretation of seeing neighbors in a dream for a married woman: Interpretation scholars say: If A married woman saw in her dream that her neighbor was making many requests in an annoying way. This vision indicates that there is someone trying to interfere between the dreamer and her husband, and she must be careful. . Those around her. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is sitting with her neighbor, and that the neighbor is religious and moral, then this is a sign that great goodness will come to her life. If a married woman sees her malicious neighbor in her dream, this is a vision that indicates the emergence of problems and fears in the dreamer’s life. The Seeing a neighbor with a beautiful appearance in a married woman’s dream indicates the security and stability in which the dreamer lives. Interpretation of a dream about joy among neighbors. If the sleeper sees in his dream the presence of joy in the neighbor’s house, then this is a good vision that portends the coming of happy events in his life and hearing news that will bring happiness to the people of his house. Interpretation Dream of eating

title: Interpretation of a dream about pure deception

preview.html: This vision has many interpretations and implications for the dream interpreter, and the interpretation varies from one person to another and according to their social status, and we will learn about it from our interpreter’s website and through the following article. Interpretation of seeing a clean bay in a dream for a single girl. An unmarried girl’s bay in a dream indicates the closest A date for her engagement or marriage in the near future, God willing. The vagina in an unmarried girl’s dream may indicate getting rid of the problems and crises she faces in her life, God willing. Cleaning the vulva in an unmarried girl’s dream means removing worries and problems and getting rid of them. Washing the vulva in a girl’s dream An unmarried woman indicates the presence of haters. Hatred in her life and she must pay attention to them in order to avoid their harm. Seeing a single girl with a clean vagina in a dream means peace and psychological stability at work or with family and friends. While seeing vaginal hair in an unmarried girl’s dream, this is a sign of anxiety. And heartaches. And the crises that destroy her in her life and she will overcome them, God willing. If a married woman finds an iron ring in a dream. This indicates that her financial situation is tight and that serious crises have passed. It may also indicate her psychological exhaustion during her life. See also: Interpretation of a dream Vaginal bleeding for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing a clean vagina in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a clean vagina for a married woman in a dream. Signifying the end of problems and disputes, psychological peace and family stability. If a married woman sees that the vagina is white in a dream, this is an indication of her high status in society. For a married woman to have hair Pubic hair in her dream is a sign of many children and good upbringing and morals, God willing. The vulva in a married woman’s dream indicates that she will become pregnant soon, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a clean bay in a dream about a man and its meaning: Seeing a married man in a dream in the vulva without feeling lust. This is good news of his coming. And obtaining a good and abundant livelihood and improving his economic condition, God willing. If a married man sees a clean bay in a dream, this indicates stability, psychological peace, and marital happiness that he lives with his wife. Clean bays in a man’s dream indicate that he will get a promotion at work or increase his status. And his status among people. A man looks at a woman’s vagina in a dream, which indicates that he is a lustful person. He commits many forbidden things that anger his Lord. This vision is a warning message to the dreamer to repent and seek forgiveness so that he does not commit many sins and transgressions. Vaginal hair in a married man’s dream symbolizes The problems, disagreements and crises that occur between him and his wife. He will overcome them and restore stability and psychological peace between them again, God willing. A married man watched his wife’s vagina and enjoyed it. It is a sign of his love and affection for her and the stability of the family in which they live together. As for if he sees his wife’s vagina smelly and full of hair The significance of the problems, disagreements, and escalating crises between them in the coming period. It could lead to separation or a...

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating moldy bread in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about eating moldy bread in a dream can have different meanings of spoiled food, so we present in the following lines the interpretation of a dream about eating moldy bread in a dream and other details that interest you. Interpretation of a dream about eating moldy bread in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about eating moldy bread in a dream can be a sign On the inability to make decisions, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees herself in a dream eating moldy bread, this may be evidence of a lack of wisdom, and God knows best. If a young man is seen eating moldy bread, this may lead to a wrong choice, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a married woman You eat moldy bread in a dream, which may represent wrong thinking, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about eating spinach in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that you eat spinach in a dream could be a sign of goodness and happiness, God willing. If the dreamer sees himself eating spinach in a dream, this may indicate a good life, and God knows the unseen. When you see a married woman eating spinach, this can represent goodness and happiness, God willing. Also, seeing spinach in a dream can indicate ease and marriage, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about eating mansaf in mourning in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating mansaf in mourning in a dream could be a sign of liberation from Worries, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees eating mansaf at a funeral in a dream, this may lead to freedom from trouble, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When she sees a married woman eating mansaf in mourning in a dream, this may represent relief from difficult problems, God willing. When she sees mansaf eating in mourning, The funeral of someone you know may express his need for prayers, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about eating a coconut biscuit in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating a coconut biscuit in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, eating coconut candy in a dream could be a sign of kindness, and God knows best. If a married woman sees herself eating coconut candy in a dream, this may indicate good things, and God knows the unseen. When she sees a single girl eating Coconut candy in a dream can lead to the Gulf, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of drinking coconut milk in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of drinking coconut milk in a dream could be a sign of healing, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a married woman sees herself in a dream drinking coconut milk, it may be That is a sign of good things, and God knows best. When you see a single girl drinking coconut milk in a dream, it may be a sign of goodness, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a young man dreams that he drinks coconut milk, this may lead to his return from exile or good changes for him, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. I dreamed that I I was eating and not getting enough in a dreamI dreamed that I was eating and not getting enough in a dream. It may be a sign of weakness and an inability to rely on yourself, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees himself eating without being full in a dream, this may be a sign that he is looking at what others have, as this may be evidence.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing relatives in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Seeing relatives in a dream has different interpretations and visions and can bring good or evil, and in some places it is interpreted as affection, love, kinship, family conflict, and their differences in the dream, and perhaps happiness and life will be abundant, and seeing relatives in a dream has different interpretations in the following article.Interpretation of a dream about seeing Relatives in a dream by Ibn SirinSeeing relatives in a dream by Ibn Sirin is interpreted as a source of great livelihood and happiness, and perhaps the arrival of joy and love for him and his family. Relatives in the major’s house are generous and loyal and may indicate a lot of money and happiness. Eating with the family is a sign of many benefits The happiness that comes and eating is only a blessing for health and good news for marriage. Parents crying in a dream is a bad and bad thing and many problems and fears. Interpretation of seeing relatives in one dreamImam Ibn Sirin believes that relatives in a dream are the best and happiest thing that will come to her and her family, and perhaps this indicates On great success and distinction in scientific and practical life. In some interpretations, we see that a woman’s family is a close marriage and the fulfillment of distant desires and dreams. Seeing relatives in the house of a girl who has never been married in a dream is evidence of the abundance of goodness and livelihood. Perhaps she will provide them with food, success in school, and attain To the ambitions that she actually seeks. Interpretation of a dream about relatives for a married woman: If a married woman dreams that she receives her relatives in her home, according to scholarly agreement, this assures her comfort and peace in her life and that she will have a large source of livelihood. If she is pregnant, she will give birth to a male child. A dream about seeing relatives in the place varies. The interpretation of a dream varies. Seeing relatives in a dream depends on the situation in which the guest is located and where he is. If you see your relatives in your bedroom, there are indications of a bad situation that may happen to you. If you see him in the reception hall and they show with their happy faces that you have come out of distress, but if their faces are sad, this will be it. The crisis that will happen to you will increase the problems caused by your relatives. If a woman or man sees relatives in the kitchen, this is evidence of problems between the family, and if gathering in the house indicates the discovery of something in the person in the dream. Interpretation of a dream about relatives eating food. Dreams have different interpretations. Depending on the situation, if a person sees a dream of seeing relatives gathering to eat at home in a place suitable for eating, this means that it is beneficial for the dreamer, but if the place is not suitable for that, which is a bedroom or a bathroom, then this is convincing evidence of the dreamer’s sadness, but if a person dreams that he He offers food to relatives, this means that he is asking for something and will not fulfill it. And if a person dreams that his relatives are eating food at the door of his house, the interpretation is according to the form of the food, if there is a decoration next to it, then this indicates the coming joy for his family. The house and the pleasure of skin, but if he eats food silently, this indicates the death and life of the person in the home. And if in a dream a person offers food and sweets to his relatives, this indicates a pleasant connotation associated with him, which is an imminent marriage, meaning hearing good news, according to

title: Interpretation of seeing a wedding for a married woman in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a wedding party for a married woman in a dream on the Moments website. Interpretation of seeing a wedding party for a married woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin Muhammad Ibn Sirin says in his book The Interpretation of Great Dreams that attending a wedding party in a dream is good news and optimism, especially if the dreamer wakes up feeling happy and joyful. Ibn Sirin continues that the fortuneteller’s view of wearing a dress like a wedding dress indicates that this woman will enter into a recent relationship or a recent period in her life that could be a bond of love, friendship, a recent project, or something close, like Nabulsi. Ibn Shaheen also agreed with this interpretation, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a hand kissing in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a wedding party for a married woman in a dream. As for seeing a married woman getting married for the second time in a dream, this indicates that the wife will soon obtain goodness, benefit, favor, and livelihood, whether for her own person. Or from the kindness shown to the spouse, children or spouse. The family in general, with the exception of her peers. Interpretation of seeing a wedding for a married woman in a dream for a man: As for seeing a husband in his dream marrying another man, or marrying his wife to another man, this indicates money, profit, and the abundant profit that this man will obtain in a trade or business, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a married woman’s wedding in a dream for a pregnant woman. The pregnant woman’s clairvoyance is as if she married someone other than her wife, with no signs of marriage appearing, indicating that she has given birth to a daughter. She also sees a pregnant woman wearing a wedding dress, which portends her miscarriage. The birth of a son, and God alone knows the unseen and knows what is in the wombs.
preview.text: Interpretation of seeing a wedding party for a married woman in a dream on the Moments website. Interpretation of seeing a wedding party for a married woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin Muhammad Ibn Sirin says in his book The Interpretation of Great Dreams that attending a wedding party in a dream is good news and optimism, especially if the dreamer wakes up feeling happy and joyful. Ibn Sirin continues that the fortuneteller’s view of wearing a dress like a wedding dress indicates that this woman will enter into a recent relationship or a recent period in her life that could be a bond of love, friendship, a recent project, or something close, like Nabulsi. Ibn Shaheen also agreed with this interpretation, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a hand kissing in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a wedding party for a married woman in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a wedding for a married woman in a dream for a man: As for seeing a husband in his dream marrying another man, or marrying his wife to another man, this indicates money, profit, and the abundant profit that this man will obtain in a trade or business, and God knows best. title: The meaning of seeing a hyena in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Hyena in a dream: The hyena is a predatory animal from the mammal family. It feeds on meat and is characterized by a strong sense of smell that enables it to track its prey and get out of it. The hyena in a dream: If you see a hyena in a dream, this is a sign of bad events that you will see in your life in the coming period, which will negatively affect your psychological state. If If someone was able to escape from a hyena in a dream, this is a sign of the collapse of worries and sorrows in his chest and his ability to overcome the difficult times he is going through, as he has a sound mind that enables him to do so. Action. For a woman, when she dreams of a hyena, this is a warning of a crisis or problems in her family environment. If one sees in a dream that he is eating hyena meat, this proves that he may be infected with witchcraft and demonic energies. In general, seeing a hyena in a dream means that the dreamer is immersed in He is immersed in the fleeting pleasures of this world and is not devoted to the teachings of his religion and commits many sins and disobedience, and he must hasten to repent before it is too late. The hyena in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great Imam Muhammad ibn Sirin - may God have mercy on him - mentioned in the interpretation of a dream of quarreling or fighting with a hyena, that it shows the dreamer’s ability to find a solution to a passing problem, in the event that he is able to overcome the hyena. If one sees a hyena biting him in his dream, This means that he will face many crises and obstacles in the coming days. As for seeing a hyena attack during sleep, this means that the dreamer will commit adultery, God forbid. If a person sees in his dream that he is taming a hyena, this is a sign that he is a very smart person who can get rid of anyone who harms him. If you see more than one hyena in a dream, this proves that there are many rivals and rivals around you, but you can overcome them with the grace of God Almighty. What does a hyena mean in a dream for Imam Al-Sadiq? Imam Al-Sadiq - may God have mercy on him - explained that seeing a hyena in a dream symbolizes a woman. When a man dreams of a hyena, and he is a social person by nature and has many relationships in reality, this is a sign that he will lose many people in his life. If a single man sees in his dream that he is sitting next to a hyena, this is a sign that he will communicate with a corrupt girl and marry her, but he will live With her are her difficult days full of problems and crises. Seeing a female hyena in a dream means that the dreamer will be surrounded by many people who seek to harm and harm him, so he must be careful and not trust anyone easily. What is the interpretation of a dream about a hyena for a single woman? Seeing a hyena in a dream for an unmarried woman symbolizes To the presence of a liar in her life and she must stay away from him so as not to cause her harm. If a girl dreams of a familiar person who has the head of a hyena, this is a sign that he holds malice and hatred towards her and never wishes her well. Seeing many hyenas in a dream for one girl means that God – Glory be to Him - He will enable her to overcome all the problems and crises that she faces if she can kill them in the dream. When a girl dreams of a hyena, this is a sign of a deceitful friend who shows her love and friendliness and hides hatred and malice. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is rejected

title: Interpretation of pronouncing the name of God in a dream

preview.html: But sometimes it is not good for the dreamer to refuse to hear the name of God or ignore it, so we will discuss with you through this topic today from your website gptafser.com/ different interpretations about the interpretation of pronouncing the name of God in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the pronouncement of the name of God in a dream A dream for a single girl: A vision of pronouncing the name of God in a dream of a girl enrolled in one of the years of study. It indicates achieving the goal and fulfillment of dreams. If the girl has come out of a failed romantic relationship with one of her relatives and she sees the name of God in her sleep. This vision is good news of the death of her sadness. Either If the dreamer commits a sin and regrets it, and she sees herself pronouncing the name of God in her dream. It is good news that God has forgiven her sins and accepted her prayers. Seeing the name of God in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates her marriage to a righteous and pious young man who will take God into account in her recovery. What if she The girl is engaged and saw her fiancé saying the name of God. This indicates a good choice of her life partner, and good news for the completion of their relationship until marriage, God willing. If the dreamer is in trouble and sees in a dream that she is begging God and remembering the word of His Majesty. The dream gives her good news of her salvation from all evil and abomination. Watch. Also: Seeing the Messenger in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of the testimony. Pronounced the name of God in a dream for a married woman. Seeing or pronouncing the name of God in a woman’s dream symbolizes happy news or preparation for a happy occasion. The dream also indicates the arrival of goodness and blessings in the life of the dreamer and those around her, and God knows best. Vision. Saying the name of God to a married woman in a dream. It indicates the provision of a new baby who will be fit for his parents in the future, God willing. Seeing the name of God in a woman’s dream may indicate the kindness of the husband and the expansion of his business to earn blessed money, God willing. But if the woman sees her children mentioning the name of God This indicates that she is raising her children well and teaching them the teachings of Islam. Seeing His Majesty in a dream may not indicate the attainment of any subject. But it followed the feeling of security and psychological comfort that the dreamer may need. If a woman sees that she is not interested in hearing His Majesty the King’s speech and ignores him, this is from Signs of her negligence in matters of her religion. Interpretation of seeing a person pronouncing the name of God in a dream and its meaning. If a person sees that he is pronouncing the name of God in a dream, and in reality he is suffering from worries and troubles. It announces that God will free his worries. Also, seeing the pronouncement of the name of God indicates that debts will be paid to their owners. In the coming days, God willing. If the dreamer sets out to start a new project and sees in his dream that he is pronouncing the name of God. This is an indication that blessings and livelihood will come to his new work. Seeing a man pronouncing the name of God in a dream indicates his strong faith in God Almighty and not following the whispers of Satan. Seeing a man pronouncing the name of God in a dream means victory over enemies. And the end of problems, whether at work or with his wife. If the dreamer wants something from God and sees that he is writing the name of God, this means that the Lord will respond to what he wants. If a person sees that he cannot bear to hear the name of God This may indicate that he is afflicted by magic or touch, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. And sometimes it may indicate immorality.

title: Interpretation of a dream about giving dead green grapes in a dream by Ibn Sirin -

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about giving dead green grapes in a dream by Ibn Sirin - Interpretation of his dream about giving dead green grapes in a dream, which basically conveys the praiseworthy humanity of the dreamer, as the grapes show the beautiful things that the visionary or wondrous person will witness. During the coming period, many people searched for the interpretation of the dream of giving dead green grapes in a dream to Ibn Sirin. We will also provide you in this article with information about what is the interpretation of the dream of a dead person eating grapes. The interpretation of the dream that he gives dead green grapes to Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of seeing grapes? Green in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream about grapes for married people? What is the interpretation of a dream about a dead person eating grapes? The interpretation of seeing grapes in a dream is a sign of the permanent spread of glaucoma in the body. When we eat grapes in season, this indicates achieving good deeds in this world and blue with the best women, children and money. When Noah was afflicted with tuberculosis, God Almighty inspired him to eat grapes, and God healed him after eating them. Interpretation of the dream of giving dead green grapes to Ibn Sirin. It is stated in the interpretation of the scholar Ibn Sirin in the interpretation of the dream that the dead person is given green grapes. A group of interpretations is that when the sick person sees green grapes in his dream, he is given For the deceased, this indicates a quick recovery from green grapes. illness. He suffers from death, because this is one of the signs of prayer and charity that will reach God, and it interprets the dream of a dead person eating grapes in the dreamer’s dream. What is the interpretation of seeing green grapes in a dream? Eating green grapes in a dream indicates that the dreamer will obtain a lot of good and great sustenance that The dreamer will acquire it in the near future, and the vision indicates that one of the relatives will have good offspring, God willing, and that he will have goodness in his marriage. And life, and God Almighty will provide them with their first offspring, and this is their offspring, and God Almighty knows best. What is the interpretation of a dream about grapes for a married woman? The interpretation of a dream about grapes for a married woman comes to the ability and abundance that will come to her, and the married woman is in love with her husband, and the interpretation of the dream is based on a number of factors, such as: the situation in which he was It includes the person who had the vision and the time in which the vision occurred. It is known that there are many dreams that bring good news and an interpretation that indicates goodness for their owner, and at the end of this article we learned what is the interpretation of a dream about a dead person eating grapes, the interpretation of the dream. By giving a dead person green grapes according to Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of seeing green grapes in a dream? What is the interpretation of a dream about grapes for a married woman?

title: Interpretation of a married woman’s dream of flying and flying over the sea in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about flight for a married woman: The world of dreams is full of wonderful things that surprise a person, such as finding himself flying in the sky or breathing under water and many other unreal things that the dreamer can see in his sleep. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman about a plane in Ibn Sirin is the interpretation of a dream about escape For a married woman? It should be noted that there are many interpretations related to the dream of flying for a married woman, and experts emphasize the issue of travel for this woman if she sees that she is flying with wings. Flying generally indicates happiness and freedom, so when it appears in a dream it can express her pursuit of happiness and excellence in Life and inclination for many dreams that she intends to achieve, God willing. If she sees herself flying, but she feels very afraid of this matter, it is certain that she has put some effort into a certain matter that is useless, and therefore she must retreat and not complete it. Whether he was flying but fell once One, it could be evidence of many things that he is trying to achieve, but he is not searching for them sufficiently, that is, he is only wishing and not making the effort for them. If a parent dies and you watch him fly in the sky, the dream is an announcement of this person’s great position in God. And his presence in Paradise, and God knows best. As for a living person flying in the sky in front of him in a dream, it is interpreted as this person’s journey or approaching the wedding step in wakefulness. What is the interpretation of a married woman’s dream of an airplane according to Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin believes that the woman who sees herself Flying in her dream has many aspirations and dreams and is always trying to create new and wonderful things for herself to help her soul.If a woman is working, this dream can prove that she has reached a position that is more important than the work she is doing and can assume authority in a position that is of great importance. He explained to her that if she was seriously ill, the dream could be interpreted with difficult and unwanted topics such as her imminent death, and God knows best. This woman may dream of traveling and her endeavor to achieve that, and thanks to her vision she may be able to achieve what she wants and is already heading towards a new path in her life related to travel. But if she finds herself flying and landing after that, she will gain many happy things in her life, and these things may be related to her children, such as finding them in a high position in their studies or work. A specialized Egyptian website that includes a group of the best interpreters of dreams and visions in the Arab world. To access it, type the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website in Google. Interpretation of a dream about flight for a pregnant woman. Al-Osaimi confirms that the flight of a pregnant woman in a dream is a happy sign for her, because it carries the meaning of an easy birth, God willing, which is expected to take place soon. The dream is confirmation for the subject of a calm and stable psychological state despite Despite the great stress that pregnancy causes to a woman, she enjoys peace of mind. If she finds herself like a bird flying in the air and hoping that God will bless her with a good son, God will grant her one and she will have a great future.
